original_text: Cain had sex with his wife. She became pregnant and she gave birth to Enoch. Cain started to build a city. He called the city Enoch because that was his son's name.
korean_text: 아내와 동침하매 그가 임신하여 에녹을 낳은지라 가인이 성을 쌓고 그의 아들의 이름으로 성을 이름하여 에녹이라 하니라

sentences.original_text: Cain had sex with his wife.
and she gave birth to Enoch.
Cain started to build a city.
because that was his son's name.
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그것이 그의 아들의 이름이었기 때문이다.
